timeline.bodyText: I don't mean annotation Nullable is not good, but HBase doesn't use it around the codebases. So here makes me feel not unified, what about comment the nullable at the method @ parma description.
timeline.author: Reidddddd

replies.bodyText: Fair point, it does look awkward when very few places in the codebase use that. Removed it.
replies.author: bharathv
